title: Clearing up the weather
creator_credit: Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
brief_description: Rob Gell, well known weather forecaster and former lecturer in Geography, discusses the weather with Peter Couchman. He describes what causes particular weather patterns, looks at various types of storm activity, and discusses “El Nino” and the “Greenhouse Effect”.
creator_credit_for_label: Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
